msg: LUCENE-3930: IntelliJ configuration: modules/benchmark/conf/ doesn't need to be a test source root - test resource *.alg files are now copied to build/classes/test/conf/ via an ant task (IntelliJ dumps them in build/classes/test/ when benchmark/conf/ is a test soruce root, and that doesn't work)
